TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NegotiateStream extends System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream

summary.span: 提供一个使用协商安全协议的流，以便对客户端-服务器通信中的客户端及服务器（可选）进行身份验证。

span.span: Provides a stream that uses the Negotiate security protocol to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in client-server communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类进行身份验证，并帮助保护客户端与服务器之间传输的信息。Use the class for authentication and to help secure information transmitted between a client and a server. 使用 ，你可以执行以下操作。Using , you can do the following. - 将客户端的凭据发送到服务器以进行模拟或委派。Send the client's credentials to the server for Impersonation or Delegation. - 请求服务器身份验证。Request server authentication. - 在传输数据前对其进行加密和/或签名。Encrypt and/or sign data before transmitting it. 传输信息之前必须执行身份验证。Authentication must be performed before transmitting information. 客户端使用同步 方法请求身份验证，这种方法会在身份验证完成之前一直阻止，或异步 方法（等待身份验证完成时不会被阻止）。Clients request authentication using the synchronous methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous methods, which do not block while waiting for the authentication to complete. 服务器使用同步 或异步 方法请求身份验证。Servers request authentication using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 使用协商安全协议对客户端和服务器（可选）进行身份验证。The client, and optionally the server, is authenticated using the Negotiate security protocol. 在 Windows 95/98 系统上，Windows NT LAN Manager （NTLM）是用于身份验证的协议。On Windows 95/98 systems, Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) is the protocol used for authentication. 在其他平台上，如果客户端和服务器均支持 Kerberos 协议，则使用 Kerberos 协议进行身份验证;否则，使用 NTLM。On other platforms the Kerberos protocol is used for authentication if both client and server support it; otherwise NTLM is used. 有关这些协议的详细说明，请参阅 MSDN 上的平台 SDK 文档，网址为 msdn.microsoft.com/library/。For detailed descriptions of these protocols, see the Platform SDK documentation on MSDN, at msdn.microsoft.com/library/. 类使用安全支持提供程序接口（SSPI）执行身份验证。The class performs the authentication using the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). 当身份验证成功时，必须检查 和 属性，以确定 在传输过程中保护数据的安全服务。When authentication succeeds, you must check the and properties to determine what security services will be used by the to help secure your data during transmission. 检查 属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。Check the property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred. 您可以使用 属性获取有关远程客户端或服务器的信息。You can get information about the remote client or server using the property. 如果身份验证失败，你将收到 或 。If the authentication fails, you will receive an or a . 在这种情况下，你可以使用不同的凭据重试身份验证。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential. 使用同步 或异步 方法发送数据。You send data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 你使用同步 或异步 方法接收数据。You receive data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 如果启用了加密或签名等安全服务，则 会自动将这些服务应用到数据。If security services such as encryption or signing are enabled, these are automatically applied to your data by the . 使用创建 时提供的流来传输数据。The transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the . 提供此基础流时，你可以指定是否关闭 也会关闭基础流。When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the also closes the underlying stream. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用 的客户端-服务器连接的客户端。The following example demonstrates the client side of a client-server connection that uses the . 客户端进行身份验证并将消息异步发送到服务器。The client authenticates and sends a message to the server asynchronously. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#0)] [!code-vb[NclNegoAsyncClient#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/VB/client.vb#0)] 下面的代码示例演示客户端-服务器连接的服务器端，它使用 对客户端进行身份验证并读取客户端发送的消息。The following code example demonstrates the server side of a client-server connection that uses the to authenticate the client and read a message sent by the client. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncServer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CPP/NclNegoAsyncServer.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncServer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CS/server.cs#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你为 `leaveStreamOpen` 参数指定 `true` 时，关闭 对 `innerStream` 流不起任何作用;如果不再需要 `innerStream`，则必须将其显式关闭。When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用此构造函数。The following example demonstrates calling this constructor. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证使用客户端的 。The authentication uses the client's . 未为服务器指定服务主体名称（SPN）。No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server. 模拟级别为 ，安全级别为 ，并请求相互身份验证。The impersonation level is , the security level is , and mutual authentication is requested. 类将构造用于相互身份验证的 SPN。The class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication. 当身份验证成功时，必须检查 和 属性，以确定 使用哪些安全服务。When authentication succeeds, you must check the and properties to determine what security services are used by the . 检查 属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。Check the property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred. 如果身份验证失败，则会收到 或 。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在这种情况下，你可以使用不同的凭据重试身份验证。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client side of a client-server connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 进行身份验证时，不会阻止此方法的重载。The overloads of this method do not block while authentication is in progress. 若要在等待身份验证完成时阻止，请使用 方法之一。To block while waiting for the authentication to complete, use one of the methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证使用客户端的 。The authentication uses the client's . 未为服务器指定服务主体名称（SPN）。No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server. 模拟级别为 ，安全级别为 。The impersonation level is , and the security level is . 类将构造用于相互身份验证的 SPN。The class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication. 此方法是异步的，并且在操作完成时不会被阻止。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止，请使用 方法重载之一。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 异步身份验证操作必须通过调用 方法完成。The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常，方法由 `asyncCallback` 委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 如果身份验证失败，则会收到 或 。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在这种情况下，你可以使用不同的凭据重试身份验证。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法，以便为客户端开始异步身份验证。The following example demonstrates calling this method to begin an asynchronous authentication for the client. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NclNegoAsyncClient#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/VB/client.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `requiredProtectionLevel` 参数为使用经过身份验证的流传输的数据请求安全服务。Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream. 例如，若要对数据进行加密和签名，请指定 值。For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the value. 身份验证成功并不保证已授予请求的 。Successful authentication does not guarantee that the requested has been granted. 必须检查 和 属性，以确定 使用哪些安全服务。You must check the and properties to determine what security services are used by the . 此方法是异步的，并且在操作完成时不会被阻止。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止，请使用 方法重载之一。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 异步身份验证操作必须通过调用 方法完成。The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常，方法由 `asyncCallback` 委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 如果身份验证失败，则会收到 或 。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在这种情况下，你可以使用不同的凭据重试身份验证。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `requiredProtectionLevel` 参数为使用经过身份验证的流传输的数据请求安全服务。Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream. 例如，若要对数据进行加密和签名，请指定 值。For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the value. 身份验证成功并不保证已授予请求的 。Successful authentication does not guarantee that, the requested has been granted. 必须检查 和 属性，以确定 使用哪些安全服务。You must check the and properties to determine what security services are used by the . 此方法是异步的，并且在操作完成时不会被阻止。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止，请使用 方法重载之一。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 异步身份验证操作必须通过调用 方法完成。The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常，方法由 `asyncCallback` 委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 如果身份验证失败，则会收到 或 。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在这种情况下，你可以使用不同的凭据重试身份验证。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.

summary.span: 开始一个异步读操作，此操作读取流中的数据并将其存储在指定的数组中。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.

returns.span: 一个指示异步操作状态的 对象。

span.span: An object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用了加密、签名、加密和签名，则读取操作将从基础流中读取数据，检查数据的完整性并对其进行解密。If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and decrypts it. 如果未使用任何安全服务（如数据加密或签名），此方法将对基础流启动异步读取操作。If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous read operation on the underlying stream. 此方法是异步的，并且在操作完成时不会被阻止。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止，请使用 方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 异步读取操作必须通过调用 方法完成。The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常，方法由 `asyncCallback` 委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 类不支持多个同时读取操作。The class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations. 如果尝试在同一流上执行另一读取操作时启动读取操作，则会引发 异常。If you attempt to start a read operation while another read operation is already executing on the same stream, a exception will be thrown. 在成功完成身份验证之前，你无法调用此方法。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要进行身份验证，请调用 、、或 方法之一。To authenticate, call one of the , , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何启动异步读取操作。The following code example demonstrates starting an asynchronous read operation. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncServer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CPP/NclNegoAsyncServer.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncServer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CS/server.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用加密、签名或加密和签名，则此方法将从缓冲区中读取数据，对其进行加密、签名或加密，并使用基础流进行传输。If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream. 如果未使用任何安全服务（如数据加密或签名），此方法将对基础流启动异步写入操作。If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous write operation on the underlying stream. 此方法是异步的，并且在操作完成时不会被阻止。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止，请使用 方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 异步读取操作必须通过调用 方法完成。The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常，方法由 `asyncCallback` 委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 类不支持多个同时执行的写入操作。The class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations. 如果尝试在同一流上执行另一写操作时启动写入操作，则会引发 异常。If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a exception will be thrown. 在成功完成身份验证之前，你无法调用此方法。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要进行身份验证，请调用 、、或 方法之一。To authenticate, call one of the , , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了开始异步写入操作。The following example demonstrates beginning an asynchronous write operation. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NclNegoAsyncClient#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/VB/client.vb#3)] 操作完成时，将调用以下方法。The following method is called when the operation completes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
